mapper.select: select a.id,a.uuid,a.user_id,a.name,a.show_name,a.description,a.cover,a.choice_cover,a.theme_cover,a.type,a.sn,a.visible,a.is_deleted,a.created_at,a.updated_at,a.deleted_at from shops a where 1 = 1 and a.is_deleted = 0

select a.shop_id,count(*) c from shop_videos a where 1 = 1
and a.is_deleted = 0 and a.media_state = 2 group by a.shop_id

select a.is_abroad * 1 abroad,count(a.id) c,sum(length) sec from videos a where 1 = 1
and a.is_deleted = 0 and a.media_state = 2 group by a.is_abroad
